author: vmassol
msg: modified samples so that they use the new WebRequest and WebResponse

author: vmassol
msg: updates the changes to reflect the integration of HttpUnit in the end method

author: vmassol
msg: deprecated ServletTestRequest (replaced by WebRequest) + deprecated signature endXXX(HttpURLConnection) and replaced by two possibilities : endXXX(org.apache.commons.cactus.WebResponse) or endXXX(com.meterware.httpunit.WebResponse) + deprecated AssertUtils (moved to WebResponse) + build now needs HttpUnit jar + added unit tests for AbstractTestCase (needed to create a mock of HttpURLConnection to do so)
